titleText: Microsoft and SAP both commit to running SAP HANA on Azure internally
mainText: Over the past several years, Microsoft and SAP have made lots of partnership commitments. On November 27, they announced yet another expansion round. This time, Microsoft and SAP are committing to deploy each other's cloud offerings.

titleText: Microsoft, SAP to use and sell more of each other's cloud services

titleText: Microsoft Adds SAP as Cloud Partner to Challenge Amazon
